projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

interpretation.p:
Interpretive markup which is visible only in analytic transformations of this file consists of:
Highlighting in hi elements,
Corruptions in sic elements,
Remarks in note elements with the resp attribute identifying the agency.

refsDecl.p:
A reference is given in the xml:id attributes consisting of
a pragmatic abbreviation of the title: Śivasaṃkalpopaniṣad = ŚSU,
the number of the verse in arabic numerals.

lg.l: yénedámṃ bhūtáṃ bhúvanaṃ bhaviṣyát párigṛhītam amṛ́tena sárvam,
yéna yajñás tāyáte saptáhótā tan me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yéna kármāṇy apáso manīṣíṇo yajñé kṛṇvánti vidátheṣu dhī́rāḥ,
yád apūrváṃ yyakṣám antáḫḥ prajānānṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu,
yát prajñā́nam utá céto dhṛ́tiś ca yaj jyótir antár amṛ́taṃ prajā́su,
yásmān ná ṛté kíñṃ caná kárma kriyáte tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yáj jā́grato dūrám udaíti daívaṃ tád u suptásya táthaivaíti,
dūraṅṃgamáṃ jyótiṣāṃ jyótir ékaṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yásmin ṛ́cas sā́ma yájūṃṣi yásmin prátiṣṭhitā rathanābhā́v ivārā́ḥ
yásmim̐ṃś cittáṃ sárvam ótam prajānānṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
suṣārathír áśvān iva yán manuṣyā́n nenīyátebhī́śubhir vājína iva
hṛtprátiṣṭhaṃ yyád ajiráñṃ jáviṣṭhanṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yád átra ṣaṣṭháṃ triśatám̐ṃ śarīráṃ yajñásya gúhyanṃ návanā́bham ā́dyam,
dáśa pañcatrim̐ṃśátaṃ yyát paráñṃ ca tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yé páñca pañcā́ daśatám̐ṃ śatáṃ ca sahásraṃ ca niyútaṃ nyárbudaṃ ca,
te yajñacittéṣṭakāttám̐ṃ śárīraṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
védāhám etáṃ púruṣaṃ mahā́ntam ādityávarṇanṃ támasaḫḥ parástāt,
tásya yóniṃ paripaśyanti dhī́rās tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yéna kármāṇi prácaranti dhīrā víprā vācā́ mánasā kármaṇā ca,
saṃvvídam ánu sáṃyyanti prāṇínas tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yé máno hṛ́dayaṃ yyé ca devā́ yé antárikṣe bahudhā́ cáranti,
yé śrotráṃ cakṣúṣī sáñṃcaranti tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yéna dyaúr ugrā́ pṛthivī́ cāntárikṣaṃ yé párvatāḫḥ pradíśo díśaś ca,
yénedáñṃ jágad vyā́ptaṃ prajā́nānṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
yénedáṃ sárvaṃ jágato babhūvúr yé devā́ ápi maható jātávedāḥ,
tád evā́gnitápaso jyotír ékanṃ tán me mánaś śivásaṅṃkalpam astu.
aciṃntyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vyaktāvyaktaparaṃ ca yat,
sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ jñānaṃ tán me mánaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
asti vināśayitvā sarvam idaṃ nāsti punas tathaivā dṛṣṭaṃ dhruvaṃ,
asti nāsti hitaṃ madhyamaṃ padaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
asti nāsti viparīto pravāho 'sti nāsti sarvaṃ vā idaṃ guhyam,
asti nāsti parāt paro yat paraṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
parāt parataraṃ yasya tatparāc caiva tat paraṃ,
tatparāt paratojñeyaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
parāt parataro brahma tatparāt parato hariḥ,
tatparāt parato hy eṣa tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
gobhir juṣṭo dhanena hy āyuṣā ca balena ca,
prajayā paśubhiḥ puṣkalādyaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
prayataḥ praṇavo nityaṃ paramaṃ puruṣottamaṃ,
oṃkāraṃ param ātmānaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
yo vai vedādiṣu gāyatrī sarvavyāpī maheśvaraḥ,
yad dviruktaṃ tathādvyaiśyaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
yo vai veda mahādevam paramaṃ puruṣottamaṃ,
yaḥ sarvaṃ yasya cit sarvaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
yo 'sau sarveṣu vedeṣu pathate hy aja īśvaraḥ,
akāyo nirguṇo dhyātvā tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
kailāśaśikhare ramye śaṃkarasya śubhe gṛhe,
devatās tatra modyaṃnti tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
kailāśaśikharābhāsā hi bhavad girisaṃsthitāḥ,
nīlakaṃṇṭhaṃ trinetraṃ ca tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
ābrahmastambaparyaṃntaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram,
utpātitaṃ jagad vyāptaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
ya imaṃ śivasaṃkalpam sadā dhyāyaṃnti brāhmaṇāḥ,
te paramokṣaṃ gamiṣyaṃnti tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
tryambakaṃ yajāmahe sugaṃndhiṃ puṣṭivarddhanaṃ,
urvārukam iva baṃndhanān mṛtyor mukṣīya māmṛtāt tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu.
